title: Land Near Royal English School & Aladdin Swimming Complex, Mandandawela
details:
48 perch land is available for sale as a whole or blocked out.

1. The land is situated next to Royal English School, Mandandawela.
2. The land can be accessed from two roads, one from the road leading to Aladdin Swimming Complex and the other from the road leading to Royal English School.
3, Water and Electricity is available.
4. Breath taking views of the knuckles range.
5. About 500m to A9 road (walking distance)
